content: Hey there - I have a medical student from Thailand who is interested in FHIR - is there any HL7 FHIR community there? I would like to connect him.

We’re building up a FHIR community in Thailand. Here’s the link to Thai channel https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/211064-ประเทศไทย-(thailand). If you want to join our community, please contact us at https://www.facebook.com/FHIRthaild/.
